parameters: Today, a new student will be transferred to our class
今天有一位新同学要转进我们班
First, let's introduce ourselves to you
先给大家自我介绍一下吧
Hello, everyone. My name is Freelyn
Hello, everyone. My name is Freelyn
It seems that there is nothing to say
好像没有什么可说的了
Oh, by the way, I'm the head of SOS Supernatural Research Club
哦对了，我是SOS超自然研究部的部长
If you are interested, please join us
大家有兴趣的话，欢迎加入我们
Our class is busy too. Don't try to trick our classmates to work for you
学园祭我们班也很忙的，可别想着骗我们班同学去给你干活
Go to the empty seat first and sit down
Didn't you wake up just now? Why did you go back to sleep
刚才不是已经醒了吗，怎么又睡回去了
So sleepy in the early morning
Did you stay up late for Abex!
You may not obey though I talk to you
虽然说了你可能也不会听
Don't stay up late to play Abex!
As I told everyone, our Kakuensai will begin tomorrow
就同之前和大家说的一样，学园祭明天就要开始了
请那两位同学不要窃窃私语
王缪可，汐！说的就是你们两个！
It's all your fault! We just been scolded!
The next class will be a self-study session. For those who have duties for either the stage play rehearsal or the booth preparation, please go to your places and standby
下面这节课是自习课，请报了名要去舞台剧组和摊位组帮忙的同学现在可以自行去到相应的场地
One more thing, although I have asked this before, any volunteers for the blackboard newspaper?
另外，我还想再询问一遍，我们班真的没有人愿意出黑板报吗？
Although it's not something as big as the stage play, it is still a chance to show your abilities
这个黑板报虽然没有舞台剧这么大型，但对于大家来说也是一个很好的展示自己的机会
没有同学要报名参加吗？
Ari sang didn't you just join the stage play
雅莉同学你不是也参加了舞台剧吗
Not too much time to draw blackboard newspaper for you
给你画黑板报的时间不多了
那好吧，雅莉你就去试试吧
But we should focus on the stage play first. It doesn't matter if we can't finish the blackboard newspaper
但是还是要以舞台剧为重哦，黑板报画不完也没关系的
Who's that sitting next to me
坐在我隔壁的那个是谁啊
I wonder why I don't know about this guy
为什么我好像不认识她
Why does she hang a dried fish on her ear
她为什么要在耳朵上挂条小鱼干呀
We are classmates from today on
从今天起我们就是同班同学了哦
She still doesn't seem to wake up
Oh, that seems to be a good opportunity to expand members
哦~那看来是扩充部员的好机会
Yes, Mrs. Freelyn is the head of the SOS supernatural club
对哦，菲林同学是超自然部的部长
Chief must be very busy right?
The biggest feature of our club is we have nothing to do
我们社团最大的特点就是没事做
After all, there are not so many supernatural phenomena
毕竟哪有那么多超自然现象嘛
Huh? You are... Ah, you are Freelyn sang
I'm sorry I fell asleep just now
It doesn't matter. Now that we wake up, we can start club activities
没关系，现在睡醒了我们就可以开始社团活动咯
Freelyn is the head of the SOS club
菲林是超自然研究部的部长哦(小声)
